snippet: The Penumbra Theater in St. Paul has cut its budget and laid off staff, hoping to raise enough money to put on one production next spring.
abstract: The Penumbra Theater in St. Paul has cut its budget and laid off staff, hoping to raise enough money to put on one production next spring.

headline.main: African-American Theater in Minnesota Suspends Programming
headline.print_headline: Tough Times for Penumbra, St. Paul African-American Theater
